mods.abstract: Typed purchase order from Leonard Needham for 100 2-color window cards announcing the Labor Day Bluegrass Festival at the River Ranch Resort 27 miles east of Lake Wales, Fla. Cast feastures Carl Story and the Rambling Mountaineers, Sunny Bluegrass Lincoln Co., Partners Keil Brown and Tall Timber Bluegrass America Bluegrass Express, Boggy Creek Bluegrass Sunshine Bluegrass Boys, and the River Ranch Ramblers.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
